TopicTitle: 100 ways to get kicked out of wallmart

Articles.Content: 139. Stick pricetags on people's foreheads
140. Removing all of the "X% off!" Signs.
141. Mark everything down to -2000% They would lose so much money
142.go to the bathroom ,and super glue the door shut with yourself inside with a month supply of food ,and water.
143. Poke a hole in every glue bottle just so they all dry out.
144. Superglue all the employees together.
Make racial slurs at people
do this
147.Dance to your favorite song ,and before the song ends rip your cloths of ,and sing the rest of song.
148. Tell all of wallmarts secrets!
149: knock down all the clothes racks.
150. Drive a bulldozer through the store.
151.smash all the produce.
152 Get C4 and blow up the half the store.
153: Suicide nuke it (The nuke will throw you out, mostly).

154: Shove a lit pack of firecrackers in a bystander's pants when they aren't looking. Be sure to look back at them and laugh at them. Bonus points if it's an employee. Extra bonus points if it's the manager.
155.Plug your pc into the thoses giant pc tv display ,and play kerbal space program. Bonus points if you manage to get to Eve before you kicked out.

156

Rearrange the shoes. Put a size 7 with a size 6 of the same style. Match a man's boot with a child's slipper. Have fun, be whimsical!
157.Go ,and cause a flooding in the store by plugging there toilets with paper.

158

print out 184719835 copies of this and hand them to customers.
159: Get a sandwich bag and fill it with some mud. Go to the store in question, do your shopping, and when you're in the checkout open up the bag and pour the mud on the clerk.
160.you have a steakout inside the stores bathrooms.

161: Go in the store, go to the checkout and buy a candy bar. Look surprised at the price and bargain with the clerk. Try to get a better deal on the candy bar. Get innocent bystanders in on the act. Try to get other employees to justify your bargaining. Finally, after a few minutes, say some expletives and attack the employees.
162.have a food fight

163: Bring a chair into the store, set it up in front of the Televisions, and if employees question you, tell them you're taking the Televisions for a "Test Watch". If not, take out a pair of 3D glasses and pretend you're watching an emotional drama movie. If you see the employees coming towards you, fall out of your chair and start crying.
